net.bubbaland.trivia.client.tabpanel

Class RoundQuestionsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • net.bubbaland.trivia.client.TriviaPanel
              • net.bubbaland.trivia.client.TriviaMainPanel
                • net.bubbaland.trivia.client.tabpanel.RoundQuestionsPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class RoundQuestionsPanel
extends TriviaMainPanel
    A panel that shows all of the questions for a round. RoundQlistPanel is a panel that contains a list of all the question data for a round. The panel consists of a header row and then a sub-panel placed inside a scroll pane. The sub-panel is created via an inner class. Each row of the sub-panel contains GUI elements displaying data for one question. Unused rows (for a speed round) are created but hidden until necessary.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
